description:
Wanted to learn about Google's advertising platform adwords? This course assumes no prior knowledge of adwords. If you have a business or website to promote then using adwords, if done correctly, is the fastest way to drive traffic to your website.

We cover the basics from actually setting up an account to going through how campaigns, ad groups and ads are structured.

If you are completely new to adwords and either wanted to learn the skills so you can start writing and ads to help others or you run your own business and want to promote it using Google adwords then this course is for you.

From the basics of campaign creation, through keyword research to keyword match types it is all explained here.
title: Adwords for Beginners
